website_summaries.verdict: Large-capacity jar of professional-level flea control product to treat serious problems.
pros: Matches all federal guidelines for safe use around pets and humans
Provides protection against fleas for an entire year
Powder is designed to cling to carpet fibers, resisting the pull from a vacuum cleaner
Large container can treat up to 900-square-feet of carpeting
cons: More effective against larvae than adult fleas

customer_reviews.title: BEST product out there for combating fleas.
customer_reviews.text: Have order this twice before, and recently, I ordered another "2-pack". My flea infestation (another one) almost cleaned up after using 2 packs a couple of weeks ago, but I need to "dose" everything probably one more time. This stuff is REALLY the best. My vet had recommended it, and when I saw her yesterday, I thanked her. I've worked in cat rescue for 15 years now, I really had few problems (since my cats are all indoor) until I took in 2 rescue dogs about 3 yrs ago. They're on flea preventative, but we are having a bad flea problem (again) in my area. Anyway, can't recommend this product highly enough, especially since it's non-toxic to the animals.
customer_reviews.author: brea57

customer_reviews.title: Use a hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I made my own shaker with smaller holes as another reviewer suggested. To get the powder under the beds I used a hair dryer on the cool cycle and shook the powder in front of it. I watched with a flashlight on and the coverage was fantastic. Use a push broom to work the powder into your rugs and carpeting and vacuum wood floors afterwards to contain the dust. Fleas seemingly disappeared overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Moto Cross

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff in the world. No more fleas; only using this product
customer_reviews.text: Went from infested to not a single flea for the last year or longer. Great product. Just be sure to apply it on all carpet surface, along edges too. Clean and dry (in dryer) all dog laundry. (or put in closed bag for about 2 weeks) & to cover everything; It'll get dusty. Non-toxic We no longer use any frontline (not that it worked at all -for fleas- anyway.) Or any product for that matter. We vacuum often & still have never had any more flea issues. So happy!! It is a miracle powder <3
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: This stuff WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: We had a developed a bad flea problem during the summer. Used aerosol bombs a couple times and had limited and short lived success. My mother in law told me about this stuff. Feeling I had nothing to lose I ordered this. I bought the 2 pack and followed the directions and even left it down for longer than needed. It has been several months now and not one flea! So that is 4 dogs in a semi rural setting and no more fleas at all!! So yes it gets my vote for sure.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lowmon

customer_reviews.title: FleeBuster Literally saved my dogs life!
customer_reviews.text: My parents house was infested with flees, so bad the allergy to flees caused my dog to be anemic and was life threatening. We treated the floors and carpets with Flee Buster and then had the carpets steam cleaned 48 hours later to really maximize the cleanliness. I have ordered a second batch to reporter with and will be applying this week. So far I have seen VERY little flees on my dog and he has become his energetic self again! I have also used Capstar and Comfortis to tackle the flee issue!
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Claman

customer_reviews.title: Product that actually takes care of flea infestations
customer_reviews.text: This product really does take care of the fleas and eggs when used as directed. Now 3 years flea free.
customer_reviews.author: kdw

customer_reviews.title: All this is going to do is make a mess and waste $60.
customer_reviews.text: I caught 5 fleas. I put them in an old pill bottle with this product. 4 hours later, they are still jumping around inside the bottle. Im requesting my money back. All this is going to do is make a mess and waste $60.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Huntly

customer_reviews.title: works great fleas are gone and did not get re-infestation the ...
customer_reviews.text: works great fleas are gone and did not get re-infestation the following summer still working from first application highly reccommend
customer_reviews.author: TBD NailsTop Contributor: Nail Polish

customer_reviews.title: My vet recommended flea busters and 2 years later my house remains ...
customer_reviews.text: The product works as advertised. I have two dogs and had never had a flea issue in my home. Then I hosted a dog that turned out to have fleas for one night and my home was soon overwhelmed. My vet recommended flea busters and 2 years later my house remains flea free.
customer_reviews.author: Smo

customer_reviews.title: Thank goodness for this product! Worth every last cent ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness for this product! Worth every last cent and fixed my almost nervous break down from having fleas in our home from our escape artist of a cat. THANK you fleabusters!!
customer_reviews.author: daman

customer_reviews.title: Good non toxic product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product off and on for years. This is the best price I have found. If you are looking for a product that is non toxic to help keep away fleas this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Justmyopinion

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: This is not flea busters I have used this product for 30 years. This did not kill a single flea. Do not buy. And I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Bill S.

customer_reviews.title: Follow directions
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to sweet this INTO the trim on the floor, they like to hide behind walls. This worked nicely for us in a 1500 sq foot house.
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: Better than nothing
customer_reviews.text: Did not get rid of the fleas but keeps them controlled. Can't get cats out to have professional service come in, so at least this keeps them manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Sindy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It worked, the only issue was how difficult it was to remove the excess.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dried 'em up fast and vacuumed 'em up where they belong!😀
customer_reviews.author: RickWulfe

customer_reviews.title: Recommendable!
customer_reviews.text: It works great! But beware this is like drywall dust! It will get into every crevices where they hid! Worthy product!
customer_reviews.author: Wanda D.

customer_reviews.title: This is GREAT stuff! We use it every year on the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is GREAT stuff! We use it every year on the carpets. It's easy to use, non-toxic, and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Robards

customer_reviews.title: The only thing that got rid of our infestation of ...
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that got rid of our infestation of fleas is this product. It really works and is non toxic to animal and human. I will buy it seasonally.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Keefer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: REally does the job when you have a serious flea problem.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Geffers

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I would give this product a lower rating if there was one. It was totally ineffective!
customer_reviews.author: Aptkat

customer_reviews.title: Fleabuster
customer_reviews.text: Use it a couple of times last summer. Still no fleas and much safer for my pets.
customer_reviews.author: JE

customer_reviews.title: Too soon to tell but it appears to be working ...
customer_reviews.text: Too soon to tell but it appears to be working okay. I coated the carpets and furniture. The dog still has fleas but how do you keep him from getting them if he has to go outside? You will want to wear a mask when applying.
customer_reviews.author: TTaggart

customer_reviews.title: A real miracle
customer_reviews.text: Stop those slow and failing home temedies, give this stuff two weeks and get your life back!
customer_reviews.author: joe tanga

product_meta.title: Fleabusters Rx for Fleas Plus
product_meta.description: Size:1For over 30 years, Fleabusters has been successfully used by millions of pet owners. Recommended by veterinarians and pet professionals, Fleabusters is a home environment product for the eradication of fleas. The product is easily applied to carpets, area rugs and baseboard areas of other hard surface floors. It can also be applied on upholstered furnishings. HOW IT WORKS - Fleabusters Rx for Fleas Plus attaches to larvae as they wiggle through and then dehydrates them. Its neutral pH of 7.0 makes it safe for carpets, but also resists repelling pests. Roaches, ants, fleas, and other household pests can sense and avoid alkaline or acidic substances, but crawl right through the natural pH of Fleabusters products. COVERAGE: One cannister will treat up to 1200 sq. ft. or an average sized home with 5 rooms! Because the flea powder is so fine it only requires a small amount applied everywhere to be effective. More is not better! Only a few microscopic crystals are all that's necessary to kill the flea larvae. WHAT TO DO IF IT DOES NOT WORK - The “One Year” satisfaction guarantee is completely unconditional. Owners can return product for a full refund to the manufacturer if not satisfied, or for a replacement if the product fails to last an entire year. If the customer lives in areas with a local Fleabusters service center, then the manufacturer could also apply credit towards in-home services to treat pests associated with pets.
feature_bullets: Children and pets can come in immediately after application
Treat you carpets, area rugs and baseboards (cracks/crevices)
